title: Eggnivia is a thing so why not this
body: If for some reason an Alistar goes unstoppable wouldn't it be so much better if it read as "Summoner is unstoppabull!" It feels needed if you disagree take it to David "Phreak" I'm sure he will love this.

replies.body: I honestly don't know why this isn't a thing? _Rito Plz_

Although it's a nice jester (I wouldn't mind it in normal games.) It leaves a lack of professionalism which Riot is trying to output.

Perhaps for April fools or another holiday event it might happen?
Well, the did Dazza and Bazza for April Fools SOH EYE don't SEA Y KNOT.
An Alistair would not get to the point where they are unstoppable very often anyway. Even less so in ranked, I understand where you are coming from though.
Why would an Alister be unstoppabull?
Do you mean why would an Alistair get to the point where they are unstoppable?
